Name: Ngozi Okaro, Member of the New York City Equal Employment Practices Commission.
Title: RESOLUTION APPROVING THE APPOINTMENT OF NGOZI OKARO AS A MEMBER OF THE NEW YORK CITY EQUAL EMPLOYMENT PRACTICES COMMISSION
BodyName: Committee on Rules, Privileges and Elections

History.Action: Hearing on P-C Item by Comm
History.Description: This Resolution was Hearing on P-C Item by Comm
History.BodyName: Committee on Rules, Privileges and Elections

History.Action: P-C Item Laid Over by Comm
History.Description: This Resolution was P-C Item Laid Over by Comm
History.BodyName: Committee on Rules, Privileges and Elections

History.Description: This Resolution was Introduced by Council

Text: RESOLVED, Pursuant to Chapter 36 of the New York City Charter, the Council approves the appointment of Ngozi Okaro as a member of the New York City Equal Employment Practices Commission to serve the remainder of a four-year term that expires on June 30, 2027.
